text: Gu nduara, gu buna muen mba wari ga rɨgiavra ki ntɨɨrir ki. Khe Guma Bakɨme suaŋgi buneŋ fhuvara. Gu khaŋ nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgip, na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma the mbiga the tɨgi, ana mba tɨgi mbik guigira Zisas khothɨgi fhu, mba mbik won mana vuzvugira kɨrim, ana man ana thamtha thari.
